overview: The film version of the film is inherited and developed from the novel of the same name by writer Doan Gioi. The film tells the adventure journey of An - a boy who unfortunately lost his mother on the way to find his father. Together with An, the audience will experience the richness of nature and the unique cultural beauty of the land of Nam Ky Luc Tinh, the chivalrousness of the farmers clinging to the forest and the patriotism against the French first. 20th century.
title: Song Of The South
